name: Russian Roulette
summary: Russian Roulette is no longer just a game of chance—it’s a survival battle that also requires tactical intelligence! In this tension-filled game, every move is made on the thin line between life and death. With a variety of abilities at your disposal, you can take control of your fate and outsmart your opponent. Use the Handcuff ability to nullify your opponent's move and gain the chance to shoot instead, putting the power in your hands. The Energy Drink lets you eject the bullet from the chamber,...
